name: v0.3.0
body:
Punchy v0.3.0 üêü
üëâ [Try out the v0.3.0 web demo!](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.3.0/) üëà

This release adds new interactable items, changes to the Slinger enemy type with a new ranged attack and AI behavior, update to Big Bass bomb throwing AI behavior and the ability to grab and throw bombs before they explode! (its a short window, be careful). We also bumped our bevy version up to 0.9.


## What's Changed
* Added code implementation for Hit Flash by @loportol in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/286
* upgrade to bevy 0.9 by @lecoqjacob in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/288
* Add ranged attack as Slinger fighter default attack by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/277
* Adjust Slinger ranged attack to remove Knockback by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/292
* fix: fix scripting error when trying to use health item. by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/297
* Delete history.db by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/296
* Make player able to grab Big Bass bomb while fusing  by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/291
* Add Big Bass bomb throwing proper AI  by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/293
* Boss bomb throw always has another static bomb sprite behind the animated explosion by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/299
* Changed hitstun to not transition state if duration is 0 by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/301
* New Items Added by @loportol in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/285

## New Contributors
* @loportol made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/286
* @lecoqjacob made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/288

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

name: v0.2.1
body:
Small feature/bugfix release to add audio to the new chain attack added in [v0.2.0](https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/releases/tag/v0.2.0).

[Web build](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.2.1/)

## What's Changed
* added flop sound effect for Dev by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/281
* sound working for chain attacks by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/284


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/compare/v0.2.0...v0.2.1

name: v0.2.0
body:
Punchy v0.2.0 üêü
üëâ [Try out the v0.2.0 web demo!](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.2.0/) üëà

Lots of fun changes this release! Our boss character now has a new bomb toss attack, Hitstop on damage application has changed, the beginnings of support for multiple attacks per fighter and attack chains is implemented and players now can wear special hats!
(Our seagull fighter also makes their first playable appearance)

## What's Changed
* Aesthetic attachments (hats++) by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/260
* bump iyes_loopless and lwim by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/265
* Hitstop by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/264
* Beginning support for multiple attacks per fighter. by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/270
* Remove unused files by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/266
* Fix inactive sword hitbox bug, update docs, reflect by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/273
* Attack hitbox insertion and activation refactor by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/274
* Small activate_hitbox query filter change for clarity by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/275
* fixed audio system bug by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/276
* Boss Bomb Throwing by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/272
* Basic attack chaining by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/pull/278


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfolk/punchy/compare/v0.1.0...v0.2.0

name: Release v0.1.0
body:
Punchy v0.1.0 üêü
üëâ [Try out the v0.1.0 web demo!](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.1.0/) üëà 

This release includes the base for our new scripting system which supports scripts that interact with the ecs world written in JavaScript and TypeScript. A writeup on the current state and some motivations behind its implementation can be found [here](https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/wiki/Scripting).
This release also features new items, both a Melee and Ranged weapon, as well as a breakable box which can contain other items.
New menu sound effects have also been added, improving feedback of menu navigation.

## What's Changed
* Change Y-Sort value to represent the base Z value by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/247
* Breakable Box by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/240
* button sounds by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/236
* Melee Weapon by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/254
* Projectile Weapon by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/258
* making button sounds random + new sounds by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/259
* Scripting MVP by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/255
* disabled demo script by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/261


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/compare/v0.0.4...v0.1.0

name: v0.0.4
body:
üëâ [Try out the v0.0.4 web demo!](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.0.4/) üëà 

This release features an MVP for our first boss enemy, Big Bass!

Also included: an entirely refactored fighter state model which was written up [on our wiki](https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/wiki/Fighter-State-Machine), updates to the enemy AI targeting, camera progression boundaries, updates to debug tools, a health recovery item, and updates to the way attacks are defined and loaded from resources.

If you find any issues or have feedback, please report [here](https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/issues).

## What's Changed
* Read Player Attack Damage From Stats by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/172
* Implement Load Progress Tracking by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/164
* Fix Bug With Hot Reload and New Loading Progress by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/173
* Implement Enemy FOV by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/174
* Make Web Build Script Exit Early on Failure by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/175
* Move EngineConfig to a Static Global by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/178
* CI: Add WASM target to Clippy job by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/184
* Implement trip points by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/186
* Update to Bevy 0.8 üéâ by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/189
* Update YAML Version and Cargo Update by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/190
* Remove Unneeded Dependencies by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/192
* Revert "Update YAML Version and Cargo Update" due to broken gamestate‚Ä¶ by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/193
* Deserialization Fix by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/194
* Implement first version of camera stopping by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/171
* Update Org Name & Links in README by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/199
* Improve AI targeting by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/198
* Add Health item by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/202
* New Fighter State Design and Gameplay Refactor by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/203
* Update Bevy Fluent to Released Version by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/212
* Create ARCHITECTURE.md by @erlend-sh in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/214
* Move LocalizationExt Trait to `localization.rs` by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/215
* Remove Unused ActionIntents Struct by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/218
* making clear to the player by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/219
* Enemies chooses the closest player by @Zac8668 in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/220
* Rebase Boss MVP by @edgarssilva by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/222
* Allow Configuring Debug Tools at Runtime by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/223
* Load attack properties from assets by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/221
* Move attack damage to attack definition in YAML by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/226
* Fix rapier debug render by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/224
* Update Bevy Parallax to Latest Released Version by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/228
* Inventory system by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/206
* new music files + levels folder + all levels by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/225
* Fix YSort and add editable colliders by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/229
* Debug lines for y-sorting by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/230
* Add projectile despawning on collision. by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/233
* new healing system | making it easier to organize by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/232
* Update Leafwing With Bugfix and Cargo Update by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/237
* Re-enebled boss ai, unique groundslam attack by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/235
* Hurtbox size update by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/238
* gamefeel fixes, updated flopping, knockback priority, timer, velocity. by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/239
* Position fighters transform relative to feet by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/241
* temporary fix for boss background sort issue by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/244
* updated doc and code to clarify intent and current use for ysort by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/245
* updated bevy version in Cargo.toml and wasm-bindgen in web-demo workflow by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/246

## New Contributors
* @Zac8668 made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/pull/220

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfolks/punchy/compare/v0.0.3...v0.0.4

name: v0.0.3
body:
Our third release! [Officially announced on itch.io](https://spicylobster.itch.io/punchy/devlog/409761/punchy-makes-its-debut-).

üëâ [Try out the v0.0.3 web demo!](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.0.3/) üëà 

This build marks the beginning of support for local multiplayer with two playable characters!

We've added new enemies and enemy variants, ingame controller remapping, a bottle item which can be picked up and thrown, level and camera bounds which account for two players, music and sound fx, and many code improvements which will lay the foundation for new features to come.

We've also done significant work toward improving contributor workflow, setting up bors and updating our CI/CD.
In addition to our web build, we now build native binaries for multiple platforms, check them out below.

If you find any issues or have feedback, please report [here](https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/issues).

## What's Changed
* Implement Input Mapping by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/52
* Add Menu Gamepad Bindings by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/56
* Move Game Loading To It's Own Module by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/58
* Localization & French Translation by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/59
* Add direct ingame start functionality by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/60
* Proper camera logic, and new player movement limitations by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/62
* Remove Unnecessary Closure & Log Message by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/64
* Use Engine Config For Menu Skip Functionality by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/65
* Fix Missing Label Warnings by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/68
* Refactor fighters spawning by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/69
* Allow All Gamepads to Control Camera and Menu by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/70
* Fix Cargo Warnings by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/71
* Add Check Recipe to Justfile by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/72
* Rename Crate to `punchy` by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/75
* CI: Add Clippy correctness checks (and Cargo check data caching) by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/78
* Load `EngineConfig` From Query String & Add Log Level Config by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/74
* Storage abstraction by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/79
* Update issue templates by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/93
* Add Discussions Link for Questions by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/94
* Use Issue Forms For Issue Templates by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/95
* Fix panics on players death by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/98
* Add audio base support, with enemy attack effect(s) by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/80
* Add PlayerIndex component, and fix HUD players ordering by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/101
* Disable LTO entirely for dev profile by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/109
* Remove any optimization for the debug build by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/110
* Input Settings Menu by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/100
* Update project metadata in Cargo.toml by @orhun in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/114
* Update the project name in the license by @orhun in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/113
* Update badges in README.md by @orhun in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/115
* Hide Verbose Sound System Logs by Default by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/116
* Add GitHub workflow for automated binary releases by @orhun in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/112
* Move attack systems into attack plugin (module) by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/119
* Return to main menu on players death by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/118
* Remove orphan Panning component and related code by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/104
* Spawn items support by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/120
* Don't play menu music when the autostart flag is set by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/122
* Build for different platforms during CI by @orhun in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/111
* Weapons refactoring by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/123
* Setup Bors by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/128
* Add Bors badge to README by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/129
* Fix "puncy" typos by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/135
* Add flop sound to Sharky by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/137
* Attack hitbox and startup frame refactor by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/134
* Updates to Github workflows, primarly remove cache building and leave build to release by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/142
* Fix World Cleanup and Refactor as System Param by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/143
* issue 121 is already closed by @DRuppFv in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/151
* Add items picking logic by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/126
* Implement player movements clamping (currently, via helper function) by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/154
* Add offset to enemy attacks by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/158
* Add more enemies by @edgarssilva in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/160
* Gracefully Handle Locales That Fail to Parse by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/162
* temp fix for attack frames by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/166
* Remove Strip Flag in Release Profile by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/168
* Web Build & CI Improvements by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/170

## New Contributors
* @orhun made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/114
* @DRuppFv made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/135

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/compare/v0.0.2...v0.0.3

name: v0.0.2
body:
Our second release!
We now have a [web build](https://fishfolk.github.io/punchy/player/v0.0.2), Try it out and leave feedback or submit an [issue](https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/issues).
New to this release:
- Scene System featuring character, level and game definitions in YAML format, as well as the base for future hot reloading!
- Main menu, Pause menu and ingame HUD.
- Basic enemy AI.
- CI as well as automated deployment for web build.
- Many bug fixes and codebase improvements.

We have many exciting features planned, check out our open [PRs](https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pulls) for a rolling preview.

Thanks to @zicklag @edgarssilva @64kramsystem @Byteron for all the contributions and the attention you have contributed over the last two weeks!

## What's Changed
* Add Optimization Flags to Cargo.toml by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/15
* Camera Zoom Fix by @Byteron in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/19
* BodyLayers Enum More Readable by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/14
* Camera Panning Fix by @Byteron in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/20
* Add GitHub actions CI, with format check by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/16
* Implement First Pass Scene Assets by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/22
* Clippy fixes by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/25
* Add Engine Config and CLI by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/24
* Debug Features by @odecay in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/31
* Hot reload by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/30
* Establish Web Build by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/32
* Ci web demo by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/33
* Animation Loop by @Byteron in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/36
* Updated cargo.lock File by @Byteron in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/40
* Implement Main Menu With Egui by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/38
* Pause menu by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/41
* Change Pause Button to Escape by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/43
* Fix Panic When Pressing Enter on Main Menu by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/44
* Fix Camera Position When Exiting Level by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/42
* Fix Camera Z Position Changing by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/46
* Move move_in_arc and rotate systems to PostUpdate stage by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/47
* Allow Toggling Fullscreen With F11 by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/45
* Implement Life Bars & Improve UI Code by @zicklag in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/50
* Workaround for player getting stuck at the bottom by @64kramsystem in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/49

## New Contributors
* @zicklag made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/15
* @Byteron made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/19
* @64kramsystem made their first contribution in https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/pull/16

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/fishfight/punchy/compare/v0.0.1...v0.0.2

name: v0.0.1
body:
First release!

Currently Featuring:

- Player input and animations including movement and multiple attack types
- Enemy Idle and Hit animations
- Collisions
- Parallax scrolling backgrounds
- Camera control
